data.eml:eml: Identity and synonymy of Dicroscelio Kieffer and description of Axea, a new genus from tropical Africa and Asia (Hymenoptera: Platygastroidea: Platygastridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yoder, Matthew J., Valerio, Alejandro A., Masner, Lubomír, Johnson, Norman F. (2009): Identity and synonymy of Dicroscelio Kieffer and description of Axea, a new genus from tropical Africa and Asia (Hymenoptera: Platygastroidea: Platygastridae). Zootaxa 2003: 1-45, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.274672
